verses.name: Joel 2:13
verses.text: And rend your heart, and not your garments, and turn unto the Lord your God: for he is gracious and merciful, slow to anger, and of great kindness, and repenteth him of the evil.

verses.name: Joel 2:14
verses.text: Who knoweth if he will return and repent, and leave a blessing behind him; even a meat offering and a drink offering unto the Lord your God?

verses.name: Joel 2:15
verses.text: Blow the trumpet in Zion, sanctify a fast, call a solemn assembly:
